sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_apptmnt_booking.AppointmentBookingExtPointUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Utililty used by the appointment booking module to retrieve extension points</description>
        <name>AppointmentBookingExtPointUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AppointmentBookingExtPointUtil = Class.create();

AppointmentBookingExtPointUtil.prototype = {

	initialize: function() {
    },
	
	getExtensionPoint: function(extPointName, record) {
		
		if (typeof GlideScriptedExtensionPoint == "undefined") {
 			gs.error("sn_apptmnt_booking.AppointmentBookingExtPointUtil:  Scripted extension points are not enabled");
			return null;
 		}

 		try {
			var ep = new GlideScriptedExtensionPoint().getExtensions(extPointName);
 			for (var e = 0; e < ep.length; e++) {
				if (ep[e].handles == undefined || ep[e].handles(record)) {
					return ep[e];
				}
			}
			gs.info("sn_apptmnt_booking.AppointmentBookingExtPointUtil:  No extension point exists for " + extPointName);
 		} catch (ex) {
 			gs.error("sn_apptmnt_booking.AppointmentBookingExtPointUtil: Error fetching extension point " + extPointName);
 		}
		
		return null;
		
	},

    type: 'AppointmentBookingExtPointUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-10-03 21:12:38</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0e4770b773b02300c18827cb1bf6a757</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AppointmentBookingExtPointUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Appointment Booking" source="sn_apptmnt_booking">d0f0c1303ba23200ce8a4d72f3efc4ac</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Appointment Booking">d0f0c1303ba23200ce8a4d72f3efc4ac</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0e4770b773b02300c18827cb1bf6a757</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-06-08 05:07:01</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
